cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Well-appointed dorm room with bed linen and an individual locker is provided with every bed in our dorms.

We provide two fully equipped self-catering kitchens, a large laundry and lounge areas that provide space to spread out and socialise.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room with one single bed and a shared bathroom right outside the room.

Room includes a compact table and chair, wardrobe and an ultra high-definition smart tv.  Your bedside lamps also double as wireless device chargers.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room with two single beds and a shared bathroom right outside the room.

Room includes a compact table and chairs, wardrobe and smart television.  Your bedside lamps also double as wireless device chargers.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with a Queen bed and shared bathroom amenities outside the room. All linen is provided and rooms are serviced daily. Room includes a compact table and chairs, wardrobe and television.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room has a Queen bed and private bathroom amenities. Also includes a lounge chair, wardrobe, television, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities. All linen is provided and rooms are serviced daily.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.labelDescription: Room has three single beds with private bathroom amenities. Also includes a lounge chair, wardrobe, television, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Our deluxe family room has one queen bed and two single beds, with it's own private bathroom and toiletries.

Room includes a lounge chair, desk, wardrobe, fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and a smart TV.  your lamps also double as wireless chargers
